ygData.subject: Re: What should I do?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a quick note trade skills are not effected by the lvl * 5 + 5 restriction because I am currently a lvl 12 paladin with a skill of 70 which 12*5+5 = 65.
ygData.messageBody:
Just a quick note trade skills are not effected by the lvl * 5 + 5
restriction because I am currently a lvl 12 paladin with a skill of 70 which
12*5+5 = 65.
Silver

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chris Holko [SMTP:cholko@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 8:18 AM
> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] What should I do?
>
> From: Chris Holko <cholko@...>
>
>
>
> Andrew Unangst wrote:
> >
> > From: "Andrew Unangst" <andrew_u@...>
> >
> > Ok, I got about 150pp, from being extreamly lucky. I am level 4 paladin.
> I
> > have 0 smithing. I was wondering if this is enough money to get good, I
> can
> > wait four levels and put all into smithing, because I would like to make
> my
> > own plate and chainmail armor. Or should I forget about smithing because
> I'm
> > in Qeynos, and try tailoring or something?
>
>
> Honestly?
>
> Wait till you can at least put 5-10 points into smithing.
>
> Then just hunker down because it will cost you most of your saved
> fortune to
> earn enough skill. I do not know if your skill can exceed your level
> times 5 + 5
> as that restriction is on normal skills (hence my 1h slash maxes at 90
> for 17th)
>
> Just make bits upto 20 skill points, and if you have lots by then (like
> 100 bits)
> then do the lantern thing. Other wise try to make bits in 100 amounts
> (five full
> stacks) and then convert to making those into lanterns.
>
> This will take lots and lots of time. So don't do it on days you
> normally adventure
> on. And be prepared for your mouse fingers to be really sore
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 1,000!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> The EQ BlackSmithy Discussion Group
> List Administrator:
> chade@...
